description: This file defines a lightweight internal routing mechanism using React Context API for managing application routes 'Home', 'Game', and 'Settings' within a React frontend project.

methods.name: useRouter
methods.description: A custom hook to access the internal router context, throwing an error if used outside the provider.

methods.name: InternalRouter
methods.description: A React functional component that provides in-memory route management with navigate and goBack functions to its children via context.
